SELECT A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호(바코드, 귀표번호) */ , SUBSTR(B.BIRTH, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(B.BIRTH, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(B.BIRTH, 7, 2) AS BIRTH /* 생년월일 */ , B.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , RTRIM(B.KPN_NO) AS KPN_NO /* PKN번호 */ , B.SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN /* 계대 */ , B.MATIME /* 산차 */ , SUBSTR(B.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(B.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(B.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , B.MCOW_DSC /* 어미구분코드 */ , A.COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , CASE WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' THEN ROUND(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM / NVL(J.CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM, 10000)) WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' THEN ROUND(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM / NVL(J.NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM, 1)) WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' THEN ROUND(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM / NVL(J.PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM, 10000)) ELSE ROUND(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM / 10000) END AS LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM_EX , #{trmn_amnno} TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인관리번호 */ , #{lvst_auc_ptc_mn_no} LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 가축경매참여자번호 */ , #{sra_mwmnnm} SRA_MWMNNM /* 중도매인명 */ , NVL(C.ATDR_AM, 0) AS ATDR_AM /* 최종응찰금액 */ , A.AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , A.OSLP_NO /* 원표번호 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_ENV_EST J ON ( A.NA_BZPLC = J.NA_BZPLC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_DT , A.OSLP_NO , A.TRMN_AMNNO , A.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , A.RG_SQNO , A.ATDR_AM , B.SRA_MWMNNM FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_ATDR_LOG A , TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO)C ON A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = C.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = C.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = C.OSLP_NO AND (C.TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmn_amnno}) /* 거래인관리번호 */ AND (C.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = #{lvst_auc_ptc_mn_no}) /* 가축경매참여자번호 (추후 필수값으로 변경) */ AND C.RG_SQNO = (SELECT MAX(RG_SQNO) FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_ATDR_LOG WHERE NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = A.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND AUC_DT = A.AUC_DT AND OSLP_NO = A.OSLP_NO AND (TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmn_amnno}) AND (LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = #{lvst_auc_ptc_mn_no}) AND MMO_INP_YN = '1')
, TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.SEL_STS_DSC <> '22' /* 낙찰건이 아닌건만 조회 */ AND A.DEL_YN = '0' /* 삭제건이 아닌건 */ AND A.TMS_YN = '0' AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC ORDER BY A.AUC_OBJ_DSC , A.AUC_PRG_SQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MH_ATDR_LOG( NA_BZPLC /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , OSLP_NO /* 원표번호 */ , TRMN_AMNNO /* 거래인관리번호 */ , RG_SQNO /* 등록일련번호 */ , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 가축시장경매참여자번호 */ , ATDR_AM /* 응찰금액 */ , RMK_CNTN /* 비고내용 */ , ATDR_DTM /* 응찰일시 */ , MMO_INP_YN /* 수기입력여부 */ , TMS_YN /* 전송여부 */ ) VALUES ( #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ , #{auc_obj_dsc} /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , #{auc_dt} /* 경매일자 */ , #{oslp_no} /* 원표번호 */ , #{trmn_amnno} /* 거래인관리번호 */ , (SELECT NVL(MAX(RG_SQNO)+1,1) FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_ATDR_LOG WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc} AND AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND OSLP_NO = #{oslp_no} AND TRMN_AMNNO = #{trmn_amnno} ) /* 등록일련번호 */ , #{lvst_auc_ptc_mn_no} /* 가축시장경매참여자번호 */ , #{atdr_am} /* 응찰금액 */ , '' /* 비고내용 */ , SYSTIMESTAMP /* 응찰일시 */ , '1' /* 수기입력여부 */ , '0' /* 전송여부 */ )
